messages.subject: Re: Unschooling conference
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Karol Gale
<kgale@j...> wrote:

<<Does anybody know if there will be an Unschooling conference in
California anytime in the near future?
Karol (a newbie)>>

Hi Karol,

My husband, daughter and I just moved from CA in Aug of last year
(the same weekend as the last Homeschooling conference in
Sacramento). I'm not sure about a specific Unschooling conference
but, there is a Homeschooling conference every Aug. If you go
www.hsc.org, you can find out more info on it.

Melissa

messages.subject: Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: Does anybody know if there will be an Unschooling conference in California anytime in the near future? Karol (a newbie)
messages.messageBody:
Does anybody know if there will be an Unschooling conference in
California anytime in the near future?

Karol (a newbie)

messages.subject: Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: Is anyone coming down to the conference from New England that would be willing to share a ride? I am looking for a ride for myself and my 13-yo daughter. I
messages.messageBody:
Is anyone coming down to the conference from New England that would
be willing to share a ride? I am looking for a ride for myself and
my 13-yo daughter. I would share the gas and the driving.

Also, I am looking to room share with someone. I did not reserve a
room because I did not think we would be able to come but my
situation changed and now we can go.

Crystal Pina

messages.subject: Unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/26/03 2:05:37 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/26/03 2:05:37 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< What happened to the other mom-in-a-band in Australia, the big Rastafarian
rain-forest family who moved to a commune or something? Anyone in touch with
her on the side who can update us? >>

Are you talking about Neri?
I miss her!!

Ren
"They dined on mince, and slices of quince, Which they ate with a runcible
spoon;
And hand in hand, on the edge of the sand, they danced by the light of the
moon."
--The Owl and the Pussycat
Edward Lear
